description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Super Amazing Wagon Adventure is a fast-paced 2D action game with a random story!  You control a group of three migrating west on a wagon trail.  The game consists of short scenes that are sequenced together in a semi-random way to tell a crazy adventure story.  Face buffalo, wolves, bandits, bears, giant spiders, aliens, and much more!
